metadata.name: Tropical Serenity
metadata.description:
Title: Tropical Serenity
Collection: Tropical Dreams
Artist: Blue Jay Way
Edition: 1/1
Location: Big Island, Hawaii

Where do you go when you are spent and need to drink in positive vibes, peaceful ambiance and serenity?  

We all have our happy places that help us rebuild strength and energy for our next battle.

I look to nature - often northern, often remote, but sometimes tropical.  Hawaii's Big Island fits the bill.  

The kiss of the tradewinds, the rhythmic waves and the cheery birdsong soothe my soul and help me put my personal challenges in perspective.  I hope this image helps you do the same.

Extended Editorial License: Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups as long as it is attributed to “BlueJayWay.eth”. The License includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise or distribution, or derivative works.
